name: A Depressed College Student
description:
This is my first game I posted on Itch.io as well as being my first GameJam. This was made in GameMaker Studio 2. All the assets were not made by me. I am always open to constructive criticism, so let me know what you think! 

Source:

Modern Visual Novel Background: https://konett.itch.io/modern-visual-novel-backgrounds

Female Student: https://liah0227.itch.io/female-student-1

Mom: Ren'py free asset
